ygData.subject: Re: Spell Research
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/6/99 5:59:13 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... have ... actually ... Have you taken your one training in research (which will get you research
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/6/99 5:59:13 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
byakhee@... writes:

> Can anyone tell me what the approx. success rate is for spell research ? I
> just got my Book of Dark Bindings, and all attempts at creating a spell
have
> failed so far. I have been using the correct recipes. Is it rare to
actually
> succeed at this when you first start ?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Macabre, Gnome Necromancer (Bertoxxulous Server)

Have you taken your one training in research (which will get you research at
your level...) Because I have rarely failed... (I have probably a 90%
success rate...)

Sonoroud Tomebinder
